New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 2 月 29 日星期四 04:10:25 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Labour removes social media post describing Police Minister as ‘Mercenary Man’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/labour-removes-social-media-post-describing-police-minister-as-mercenary-man/6HM22HJT6JDFTD6CBT4QYZZBTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/labour-removes-social-media-post-describing-police-minister-as-mercenary-man/6HM22HJT6JDFTD6CBT4QYZZBTI/ Adam PearsePolice Minister Mark Mitchell has stated his pride in the work he did overseas. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 04:08:31 +0000 The Papakura Labour Facebook account made a post calling Police Minister Mark Mitchell "Mercenary Man" in a criticism of his work overseas as a private security contractor. Photo / Supplied
Housing Minister Chris Bishop announces resignation of Kāinga Ora board chairman Vui Mark Gosche https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/housing-minister-chris-bishop-announces-resignation-of-kainga-ora-board-chairman-vui-mark-gosche/LWTZWS6UB5FDVKPRF7SQ35WYM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/housing-minister-chris-bishop-announces-resignation-of-kainga-ora-board-chairman-vui-mark-gosche/LWTZWS6UB5FDVKPRF7SQ35WYM4/ Benjamin PlummerIt comes amid a Government review into Kāinga Ora's performance.Thu, 29 Feb 2024 04:06:04 +0000 Kāinga Ora board chairman Vui Mark Gosche resigned yesterday evening. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Liam Messam v Darryl Takerei fight in Taranaki to be a ‘Cinderella Man’ story, promoter says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/liam-messam-v-darryl-takerei-fight-in-taranaki-to-be-a-cinderella-man-story-promoter-says/ ZMXIPF2HDVC2JAEY4QFU6WSXT4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/liam-messam-v-darryl-takerei-fight-in-taranaki-to-be-a-cinderella-man-story-promoter-says/ ZMXIPF2HDVC2JAEY4QFU6WSXT4/ Jesse WoodDarryl Takerei will make his professional boxing debut against the former AB. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Taranaki's Darryl Takerei will face Liam Messam in his professional boxing debut at TSB Stadium in May.
Auckland crime: Pukekohe police arrest man who allegedly followed woman, pulled her from car, stole wallet https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-crime-pukekohe-police-arrest-man-who-allegedly-followed-woman-pulled-her-from-car-stole-wallet/YCGWGPVT75HQFNGLKTYHOCH2UA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-crime-pukekohe-police-arrest-man-who-allegedly-followed-woman-pulled-her-from-car-stole-wallet/YCGWGPVT75HQFNGLKTYHOCH2UA/ Raphael FranksThe man allegedly followed the woman out of a gaming room to her car on Edinburgh St. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 03:39:31 +0000 Police were called to Massey Ave in Pukekohe about 11.30am on Thursday after bystanders ran to a woman's aid when they saw her being assaulted.
Mt Albert homicide: Man allegedly murdered at Kāinga Ora complex named as Joeli Rankin https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-albert-homicide-man-allegedly-murdered-at-kainga-ora-complex-named-as-joeli-rankin/CSC63IAGEVH3FM2BYCZ6S7XFRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-albert-homicide-man-allegedly-murdered-at-kainga-ora-complex-named-as-joeli-rankin/CSC63IAGEVH3FM2BYCZ6S7XFRA/ Court documents named Joeli Rankin as the man who died. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 03:38:30 +0000 Two people have been critically injured in an incident on Asquith Ave, Mt Albert, Auckland on Monday, February 26, 2024. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Newshub closure: Broadcasting Minister Melissa Lee responds to claims she was insensitive, David Seymour on TVNZ dividend question https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/newshub-closure-broadcasting-minister-melissa-lee-responds-to-claims-she-was-insensitive-david-seymour-on-tvnz-dividend-问题/WGGTH4QBZFD2DMNYEXJCB7EVNI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/newshub-closure-broadcasting-minister-melissa-lee-responds-to-claims-she-was-insensitive-david-seymour-on-tvnz-dividend-问题/WGGTH4QBZFD2DMNYEXJCB7EVNI/ Claire TrevettWinston Peters says the Government can't ignore Newshub's collapse. Fa’anānā Efeso Collins: Public memorial for late Green MP attracts massive crowds in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/faanana-efeso-collins-public-memorial-for-late-green-mp-set-to-attract-massive-crowds/QIPC6LWOHVAXBDETSAO44MIYRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/faanana-efeso-collins-public-memorial-for-late-green-mp-set-to-attract-massive-crowds/QIPC6LWOHVAXBDETSAO44MIYRQ/ Vaimoana Mase, Simon Wilson, Mary AfemataTraffic management will be in place around Due Drop Events Centre this afternoon.
